text:
@realDonaldTrump And how many innocent people where sentenced to death
...by #COVID19 due to your total failure?
...by your total failure of social politics?
...in AFG/IRQ/PAK by CIA drones (due to missing verification by military)?

You hold the bible?
MT 7:3
May god reward you all your doings.
